welcome: I’m Kerem. I’m a full-stack developer. I can craft solid and scalable frontend products. Let’s meet!
aboutDesc1: I'm Kerem, graduated from Atılım University. My post-graduation transition into software engineering involved intensive coursework, project development, and work experience.
aboutDesc2: I have a strong command of web development technologies, including HTML, CSS,JavaScript, ReactJs, Java, Spring Boot. I'm also proficient in testing (Cypress and Jest), relevant React libraries and database systems (SQL).
pizza: A website (SPA) designed to bring food to hungry programmers at the computer.Router and Yup used for this app.
moviesDesc: Developed a comprehensive movie list with react,redux that users can add favorites movies.
jokesDesc: Implemented a random jokes generator that fetches data from an external API with Redux Thunk.
